entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [HTTP/3] Kestrel closes connection too soon #35470
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP3
  • Grpc Service Not Working In Visual Studio 2022 #35466
    area-grpc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Allow @page directive in Razor Components to accept constant strings #35465
    enhancement, area-blazor, area-razor.compiler, Backlog
  • What to do with Microsoft.Extensions.DiagnosticAdapter dependency #35463
    area-infrastructure
  • [Templates] Readme file included when no auth is used #35462
    area-identity, feature-templates, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly prerendered root component types may get trimmed away in the client build #35461
    bug, area-blazor
  • Blazor WASM: Upgrading to .NET 6 preview 7 breaks localization #35459
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-localization
  • New Service Fabric ASP.NET Core React application does not run #35458
    area-mvc
  • Publish nightly builds to an LKG location #35457
    area-infrastructure, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Feature request: Expose IsActive on NavLink. #35456
    area-blazor, api-suggestion
  • How to stop propagation of HTML DOM event without breaking nested components? #35455
    area-blazor, design-proposal
  • Minimal API does not start HostedService before accepting requests #35454
    area-runtime, Priority:0, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • View not found running on .Net6 rc1 #35452
    area-mvc
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshotManager` Causing Large Amount of `System.Reactive` Components in Memory #35451
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshot` Retained in Memory after Closing Solution and ForceGC #35450
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs
  • NoHotReloadListenersAreOrdinarilyRegistered fails about 50% of the time locally #35449
    test-failure, area-blazor
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http:2.2.0 Unable to resolve CVE-2020-1045 Vulnerability #35448
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • [Blazor] Discuss alternatives to change detection #35447
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Styling issues in identity UI #35446
    area-identity, identity-UI, 6.0-rc2
  • ConnectionState.getNextInvocationId() on a null object reference #35444
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-signalr
  • Exceptions when serializing log events events in the background #35443
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: By Design, Status: Resolved
  • Is Blazor Server an Option in MAUI Project ? #35440
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-desktop
  • Fix minimal APIs behavior with duplicate endpoint and route names #35436
    bug, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Improve reporting for duplicate route names in minimal APIs #35435
    bug, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1

Closed

  • .Net 6 Preview 7 - Cannot set reponse headers before returning IAsyncEnumerable in controller #35364
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, area-web-frameworks
  • Verify KestrelServerLimits are enforced for HTTP/3 #29702
    area-runtime, HTTP3, 6.0-rc1
  • Ambiguous Map method with Minimal #35323
    External, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • 404, IExceptionHandlerFeature And Response.WriteAsync: Prefixed (Corrupted) Output on .NET 5 #35469
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Unexpected behavior with docker and environment variables #35362
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Add OpenAPI/Swagger support for MapGet/MapPost/etc... RequestDelegate methods #34431
    Priority:0, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • visual studio publish aspnet core writes in output window it is release but built instead debug !? #35346
    area-mvc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, Status: Resolved, feature-runtime-compilation
  • dotnet-watch: Hot reload will hang indefinitely for blazor wasm if browser does not launch #35427
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • dotnet watch stomps over existing hosting startup assemblies #35410
    area-commandlinetools, feature-dotnetwatch
  • Error when compiling prerendering hosted project with same nuget package on server and client #35254
    question, Needs: Attention :wave:, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, area-razor.compiler, 6.0-rc1
  • Virtualize show Placeholder after call RefreshDataAsync #35315
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-blazor-virtualization, 6.0-rc2
  • `InputLargeTextArea` Component API Proposal #35007
    Done, area-blazor, api-suggestion, 6.0-rc1
  • RazorSourceGenerator should no-op more aggressively in web projects that do not contain any razor files #35404
    bug, area-razor.compiler, 6.0-rc1

Updated

  • Keyboard input doesn't work for InputDateType.DateTimeLocal #35498
    area-blazor, feature-accessibility
  • SignalR client NPM package corrupt #35494
  • Localization API improvements #35497
    api-suggestion
  • VS Code : There is no explanation for the method in intellisense Completion list #29675
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vscode, Razor.Tooling
  • Open Views/Shared/_Layout.cshtml ,type " <input asp-test="" " in the <body> tag and delete a double quote, the format is incorrect. #35495
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs
  • VSCode: CodeLens references numbers cannot be loaded if re-open the project #35493
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs
  • Blazor WebAssembly App does not build when referencing .NET Standard 2.0 assembly. #35349
    bug, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Author: Migration Bot :robot:
  • Weatherforecast runs into unhandeled error with new VS2022 Update #35477
    investigate, area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Unskip consistently failing Components.E2ETests.ServerExecutionTests #35481
    area-blazor, blazor-server
  • Let AddSpaStaticFiles be configured with multiple localized spa apps. #35485
    question, area-mvc, feature-spa, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Need help with my account #35487
    Needs: Author Feedback
  • ODE (Safe handle has been closed) after IApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopping callback is called on HttpSysServer #35491
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • IOExceptions caused by client disconnects are noisy on HttpSysServer #35490
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • Kestrel dev certificate woes #26536
    bug, area-commandlinetools, affected-few, severity-minor, Next sprint planning
  • Extend the ability to customize parameter binding for Minimal APIs #35489
    api-suggestion, feature-minimal-actions, .NET 7-Candidate
  • NET 6 RC1 Ask Mode - All PRs #35488
    6.0-rc1
  • ASP.NET Core and SPAs in .NET 6 #27887
    area-mvc, feature-spa, User Story, Priority:1, Bottom Up Work, 6.0.0
  • Enqueue_DisposedPreventsRestart is flaky #35228
    test-failure, area-razor.tooling, razor.tooling-fundamentals, Razor.Tooling
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35478
    area-runtime, api-suggestion, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0-rc1
  • enpoints.MapRazorPages() throwing an exception. #35365
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-mvc
  • Upgrade to the latest Bootstrap version #19225
    Working, enhancement, area-mvc, severity-major, affected-medium, feature-templates, 6.0-rc2
  • Kestrel should add "Connection: close" header to custom HTTP/1.1 responses if the max request body size is exceeded #31169
    bug, help wanted, area-runtime, servers-kestrel, Next sprint planning
  • [SignalR] IUserIdProvider's GetUserId has no async option #35417
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-signalr
  • Create ConsumesRequestTypeAttribute for Minimal API endpoints #35421
    api-suggestion, 6.0-rc2
  • Service provider validation hides actual exception while adding services in ConfigureServices #30267
    servers-iis, area-runtime, feature-hosting, Backlog
  • w3wp.exe halted with unhandled exception after reboot #24997
    task, investigate, servers-iis, area-runtime, severity-nice-to-have, affected-very-few, Next sprint planning
  • [ANCM In-Proc] [HttpSys] Support for custom decoder in headers #23491
    feature, enhancement, servers-iis, area-runtime, affected-few, severity-major, Backlog
  • Guid/String type convert error when extend IdentityUser<Guid> #35374
    investigate, area-identity, Backlog
  • HttpSys RequestAborted is not correct if created after the disconnect #17278
    bug, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, severity-nice-to-have, affected-very-few, 6.0-rc2
  • Using Filters in SignalR to validate resources #35420
    area-signalr, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Windows test job failure due to BasicTestApp publish/trimming #35429
    area-blazor
  • Generic Blazor inheritance doesn't compile with the C# 9 Nullable setting enabled #30531
    External, area-blazor, feature-razor.language, area-razor.compiler, nullable, 6.0.0
  • Auto-complete places message in the wrong place #35392
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, Razor.Tooling
  • WebApplicationBuilder allows changing the IHostEnvionment via the ConfigurationManager #34932
    bug, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • build.cmd fails on Windows 10 for release/5.0 #35369
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor WASM AOT]: Add Wasm + AOT to benchmarks #29902
    task, area-blazor, feature-blazor-aot-compilation, feature-infrastructure-improvements, 6.0.0
  • asp.netcore cpu throttle in k8s cluster #29150
    area-runtime, Needs: Attention :wave:, Next sprint planning
  • When creating an OpenAPI client with a space in the project name, then NSWAG fails. #28441
    investigate, area-mvc, feature-code-generation, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, Next sprint planning
  • Manually verify Blazor E2E tests, including quarantined ones #34949
    task, area-blazor, Validation, 6.0-rc2
  • I set the BlazorWebAssemblyLoadAllGlobalizationData property to true but not working after publish in .net 6 preview 7 #35338
    investigate, area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Blazor - BrotliCompress msbuild task duplicate processing of files - causes lock exceptions #29529
    bug, Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, affected-few, severity-major, feature-razor-sdk, 6.0-rc2
  • ASP.NET Identity Core 2.2 - Suppress "There are no external services ..." #12303
    enhancement, area-identity, affected-few, severity-minor, Backlog
  • Better compose/organize/design pattern for all asp.net core developer #35367
    Discussions
  • Minimal API query & route parameter mapping to an object #35304
    design-proposal, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Form submit action not redirected to default route POST action after upgrade to .NET 6 preview 7 #35384
    area-mvc, feature-routing, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • Allow more failure details for AuthZ handlers #35319
    area-security, api-suggestion, api-ready-for-review, 6.0-rc1
  • [Help] How to disable Hot Reload for ASP.NET Core projects. #35387
    area-mvc, Needs: Attention :wave:, feature-hot-reload
  • Document why using IHttpContextAccessor is discouraged #27392
    Docs, area-runtime, Theme: meeting developer expectations, Next sprint planning
  • Blazor AOT .Net6 Preview 7 - Still downloading Dlls #35302
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-aot-compilation, Discussions
  • Feature request: strongly-typed route values in `a` tag-helpers #35376
    area-mvc, feature-routing, feature-mvc-razor-views, Backlog
  • Microsoft.JSInterop - Undoc 6.0 APIs #34908
    task, Docs, area-blazor, 6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Add tests for issue and unskip fixed tests #35475
    area-runtime, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35474
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35473
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35467
    area-identity
  • [release/6.0-rc1] E2E test fixes #35460
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Fix incorrectly pooling aborted streams #35441
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Set EndpointName and DisplayName given method name in endpoints #35439
    Servicing-approved, ask-mode, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35322
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35471

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Fix SignalR TS unit tests not running on CI #35464
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35468
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1

    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35438

    6.0-rc1

    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

    6.0-rc1
  • Add FailureReasons #35425
    area-security, 6.0-rc1

Updated

  • Added support for type based parameter binding #35496
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35492
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35402
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35479
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types #35082 #35230
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Add an analyzer that complains when using using model binding attributes with a minimal action delegate (#35359) #35480

    area-runtime, ask-mode
  • Skip consistently failing Components.E2ETests.ServerExecutionTests #35484
    area-blazor
  • HTTP/3: Use new QuicStream.ReadsCompleted property in transport #35482
    area-runtime
  • Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35426
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Binding support for 'bool' values with InputRadioGroup and InputSelect #35318
    area-blazor
  • Fix 'HeadOutlet' getting trimmed away for Blazor WebAssembly prerendered apps after publish #35419
    area-blazor
  • Cancel the token when it's created after an Abort/Disconnect #35418
    area-runtime
  • Reset HttpRequestPipeReader error state if reused #35432
    area-runtime
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
